date.description: The date for which the playlist data is recorded.

channel_id.description: The unique identifier of the YouTube channel associated with the playlist data.

playlist_id.description: The unique identifier of the playlist for which the data is collected.

video_id.description: The unique identifier of the video within the playlist for which the data is recorded.

live_or_on_demand.description: Indicator whether the playlist was watched live or on demand.

subscribed_status.description: Indicates whether the viewers who watched this playlist within the specified province were subscribed to the channel.

country_code.description: The country code representing the region where the data is collected.

province_code.description: The code representing the province within the country where the data is collected.

views.description: The total number of views this playlist received within the specified province.

watch_time_minutes.description: The total watch time in minutes of this playlist within the specified province.

average_view_duration_seconds.description: The average duration in seconds that viewers watched this playlist within the specified province.

playlist_starts.description: The total number of times this playlist was started by viewers within the specified province.

playlist_saves_added.description: The number of times this playlist was saved by users within the specified region during the reporting period.

playlist_saves_removed.description: The number of times this playlist was removed from saved playlists by users within the specified region during the reporting period.
